knowledge.heading: Truth Through Investigative Reconstruction
knowledge.description: The text suggests that truth emerges not from experiencing events directly, but from methodically piecing together testimonies and evidence years later. This investigative process reveals deeper meanings that were invisible to those living through the events.
knowledge.pattern_connection: Investigative Fatalism uses retrospective investigation to transform known outcomes into mysteries, where the real discovery is understanding why tragedy was inevitable.

device_examples.quote: his mother, told me twenty-seven years later
device_examples.effect: Establishes the investigative framework where truth emerges through time and methodical reconstruction of testimony.

device_examples.quote: Let go of her, white man
device_examples.effect: Provides direct witness testimony that builds the journalistic case through accumulated evidence.
